text: @RandPaul @UnmodernedMan Yup, and I hope everyone gets a fat ticket to fill the empty government coffers that you & MitchBitch emptied! You don’t care about anyone but yourself but feel entitled to voice your opinion about Easter, churches, covid19. Only in America can this trickery take place. FYS!!
